video.title: La Prepago
video.synopsis: A woman living a double life -- as a university student from a traditional family and as a high-class escort -- soon finds the two worlds colliding.

episodes.synopsis: Andrea/Ana Lucia provides her "service" to Senator Valencia Guerra, who dies of a heart attack in her arms after giving her compromising information.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Andrea/Ana Lucia seeks out her boyfriend David, whom she finds in a nightclub in the arms of Paola, his ex. David invites Andrea to stay at his house.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia tells Captain Alzate all about her business, including how she got started and what happened on the night that the Senator lost his life.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The forensic report indicates that Valencia was murdered and Andrea/Ana Lucia is the main suspect. David asks his father for help, but he refuses.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Andrea/Ana Lucia is saved from being poisoned. The DVD with the footage that shows her leaving the Senator's room is stolen from the station.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia/Andrea's house is ransacked. Laura and Misael think thieves broke in, but Ana Lucia and Wilson know that it was Troncoso.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Andrea/Ana Lucia is pressured by Don Rey so she agrees to see Sigifredo, a client that she thinks highly of and to whom she wants to say goodbye.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The Colonel orders the policeman who's watching Ana Lucia not to lose sight of her. Troncoso and Maria del Pilar ambush her in the college bathroom.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: David, Paola and Moritz celebrate the success of their art exhibition. After the exhibition, David and Paola get drunk and sleep together.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Troncoso tries to shoot Ana Lucia, but Colonel Alzate manages to arrest him in time. Jimmy meets Formula 1 and learns about his stolen cars business.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia runs into Helena and Isabela at a laundromat and is forced to accompany them to Quique's house. Isabela suspects something.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Andrea provides a service to Patrick, who gives her a gold ingot. David tries to stop things with Paola, but she manages to gain ground.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Andrea seduces Quique, who gives in. Cristian catches them and makes a huge fuss. Consequently, Quique's family finds out that he is gay.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy sells the car to Moritz and shows his mother the checks he gave him. Ana Lucia is happy because they will be able to save the house.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia calls Don Rey to ask for his permission to stay a few days in Valle; he approves. Patrick calls Don Rey and says he wants Andrea's services.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Don Rey calls Ana Lucia and tells her he has a "service" for her, so she has no choice but to accept. Don Rey finds out Carolina went to see Patrick.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy takes Verushka to meet Evelio, who buys her car despite having doubts. Erika hears about Troncoso's death and decides to confront Don Rey.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: After performing Paola's abortion, Barbieri calls Don Rey and asks him to send girls over for a party. Ana Lucia surprises her family with Marcos.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: David waits for Ana Lucia at Verushka's. When she arrives, he tries explain what happened, but Ana Lucia doesn't want to talk to him.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Lía convinces David to go with her and Salomón to the Salinger Gold's cocktail party. Patrick asks Ana Lucia to be his exclusive "companion."
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: The Macancanes arrive at Verushka's house and kidnap her. Jimmy comes to pick her up, but when he can't find her, he gets very nervous.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Carolina tells Don Rey that she feels much better. Don Rey says he needs her for a service. Carolina meets Hugo and realizes Don Rey also pimps men.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: David tells Lía that he'll be traveling to Bogota to start working in the town's ombudsman office. Ana Lucia explains her situation to Laura.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Laura is mad because Ana hung a frame of the Virgin and Jimmy is annoying her with his camera. Don Rey calls Andrea, but she doesn't answer.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: It's David's first day at work and he's a bit discouraged by the state of his office; he believed he would be investigating, not organizing folders.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Wilson tells Erika he was thinking of getting a loan to buy another taxi so Misael can work. Erika is shocked and asks if he's in love with Ana Lucia.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia learns that the Macancanes killed Verushka. She complains to Don Rey because he sent her to work at the house of her friend's murderer.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia visits Verushka's grave, telling her that her only consolation is that the person responsible for her death is already serving his sentence.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia sees Misael collapse to the ground and runs to help him. Tino tells Chalo that he is tired of Erika having so much work.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: When the freight with their belongings from Valle arrives, Laura argues with Ana Lucia and tells her they can't take anything into the apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro's hidden a camera in his apartment and secretly takes photos of Andrea. Don Rey asks Tío Sam if he and Tino are keeping secrets from him.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro insists to Andrea that he had everything ready so they could go on a trip, but Andrea tells him that she needs to go back home that night.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Don Rey calls Alejandro to find out about Andrea. David wakes up to find Paola lying beside him, and he immediately jumps off the bed.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Andrea calls Wilson and seems to talk to him normally, but then she gives him a clue by telling him the fortune-teller was right in what she said.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Wilson takes Andrea to Don Rey's office, and Castillo successfully gets her detoxed. Alejandro arrives at the front door of Andrea's apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: While Wilson waits outside of Ana Lucia's apartment, it makes him mad to see David going inside. Ana Lucia warns him about Alejandro being there.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: The TV newscast reports the death of Alejandro, and Ana Lucia feels bad yet relieved. Wilson gets upset when she tells him she's going to see David.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Don Rey goes to the aquatic complex where Johana trains and realizes that she has a boyfriend. Ana tells Jimmy all of her suspicions about Ana Lucia.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Ana confronts Ana Lucia and asks her if she sleeps with men for money. Finally, Ana Lucia confesses that she is indeed a "prepago."
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Ronaldinho and Steven beat Jimmy, and Steven asks Jimmy what's in the box he's carrying. Steven sees the drawings inside and recognizes them.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Misael tries to prevent Johana from going to Valle. The policeman who made the report of the passenger's robbery believes that Jimmy is involved.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Anuk suspects Patrick is hiding a woman in the apartment and searches for her. Andrea escapes without being seen. Matilde and Tío Sam meet Estefanía.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: David goes in the bar with Moritz and Patrick. Andrea goes in the bar as well and secretly meets with Patrick, asking him to take her somewhere else.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Patrick asks Anuk to forgive him, but she asks him if he really loves Andrea. David tells Ana Lucia what happened at Don Rey's bar.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Ana Lucia goes to Patrick's apartment, and Anuk gets defensive. But then Ana Lucia gives Anuk advice on how to improve her intimate life with Patrick.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Steven confesses to Federico that he's the one who shot Camilo Ernesto. Liseth takes Jimmy to a deserted street, where Wilson confronts him.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: At the moment Steven has to shoot Federico, he's incapable of doing so. When Don Rey threatens Steven's family, he finally shoots Federico, who dies.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: David tells Ana Lucía he has a surprise for her as well. When they arrive at their hotel, David proposes and Ana Lucía happily accepts.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Don Rey's hit men kill both the waiter who gave them the information and Otanche in front of Andrea. Wilson rushes Andrea out of the restaurant.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Wilson, drunk, calls the hotel where David and Ana Lucía are staying. He tells David that Andrea is leading a double life and he's in love with her.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy tells his family that he's going to start working for an erotic website. Misael responds that he won't accept a dime coming out of that job.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: The minute Ana Lucía sees David, a terrible sensation comes over her and she leaves the room. Everyone finds out about what just happened.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: David tries to pay Ana Lucía and asks how many men she's slept with. She explains it's the only way to get out of her dire economic situation.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: In the classroom, Natalie shows Carolina the Princesas para Reyes website. The other students open their laptops and all see the same page.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: The doctor speaks with Wilson, Carolina and Ana Lucía and confirms Erika has died. They're devastated, and Ana Lucía and Carolina blame themselves.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Don Rey shows Wilson a picture of Cuchara, dead and practically unrecognizable. Paola takes David to a restaurant and proposes.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Before going into the hotel, Ana Lucía asks Carolina to check and see if her father's there. Misael steps into his office and they don't see him.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Colonel Alzate tells Rueda and David that he'll follow Jimmy and stake out Don Rey's bar. Misael finds the envelope Don Rey left in his office.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: David sees Ana Lucía among the guests and takes her aside. While they're talking, Moritz notices Paola's arrived and tries to cover for David.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Carolina warns Ana Lucía that her brother could be in danger, telling her it would be best to ask David for help. Ana Lucía isn't convinced at first.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Wilson confesses to Ana Lucía that he killed Don Rey. David leaves his wedding and arrives at Don Rey's bar to witness the police operation.
episodes.title: Episode 61
